action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a orange and a banana.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a mop and a book.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You put the plate on the counter.

> put mop on counter
> put book on counter
You put the mop on the counter.
You can't see a table here.

> look around
> look at counter
> look at cupboard
> look at plate
> look at mop
> look at book
> look at hallway
> look at pantry
I don't know how to interpret this 'look' action.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a table, a pillow and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a living room here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> put book on table
> put mop on table
> put plate on table
You can't see a table here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard, a mop and a plate. The cupboard is open. The mop is on the counter. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

> put book on counter
> put mop on counter
> put plate on counter
You put the book on the counter.
Model produced DONE action at turn 28, end episode.
